verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARGM-LOC: In Trump 's Washington] , [ARG1: traditions] [V: are] [ARG2: frail] and civility a novelty . But one custom that is hanging on — tattered and tenuously — is an unwritten rule
WASHINGTON ( AP ) — In Trump 's Washington , traditions are frail and civility a novelty . But one custom that [V: is] hanging on — tattered and tenuously — is an unwritten rule

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — In Trump 's Washington , traditions are frail and civility a novelty . But one custom [R-ARG1: that] is [V: hanging] [ARG2: on] — [ARGM-PRD: tattered and tenuously] — is an unwritten rule
WASHINGTON ( AP ) — In Trump 's Washington , traditions are frail and civility a novelty . But one custom [ARG1: that] is hanging on — [V: tattered] and tenuously — is an unwritten rule
WASHINGTON ( AP ) — In Trump 's Washington , traditions are frail and civility a novelty . But [ARG1: one custom that is hanging on — tattered and tenuously —] [V: is] [ARG2: an unwritten rule]
